org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.db
Class InternalDatabase

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.db.InternalDatabase

public class InternalDatabase
extends Object

The internal MySQL Database of the EPCIS Webadapter. NOTE: This class is really suboptimal and is candidate for a complete re-write for the next release!

Author:
Mathias Mueller mathias.mueller(at)unifr.ch, Dominique Guinard

getConfigurationEntry

public String getConfigurationEntry(String key)
                             throws NotFoundInDBException
This method returns a configuration entry stored in the database given its key.

Parameters:
key - The key to the configuration value.
Returns:
The stored configuration value as a String.
Throws:
NotFoundInDBException

storeConfigurationEntry

public void storeConfigurationEntry(String key,
                                    String value)
This method stores a configuration entry to the database. If the entry already exist it updates it.

Parameters:
key - The key to the configuration entry.
value - The value of the entry.

deleteConfigurationValue

public void deleteConfigurationValue(String key)
This method deletes a configuration value from the database. It does not raise an exception in case the value did not exist.

Parameters:
key - The key of the entry to be deleted.
